684729784.name: Stamina Enhancement
684729784.description:
> Increases all Helldivers' stamina capacity and recovery.

+30% increase to sprint duration
+23% increase to stamina regen

876985512.name: Localization Confusion
876985512.description:
> Increases the time between enemy encounters.

The cooldown for Bug Breaches and Bot Drops is increased by 10%.

1110686504.name: Vitality Enhancement
1110686504.description:
> Allows all Helldivers to resist injury.

Helldivers take less damage from all sources and are more resistant to limb injuries. Torso can still hemorrhage.

1908198785.name: Hellpod Space Optimization
1908198785.description: > Helldivers come out of the Hellpod fully stocked on Ammo, Grenades, and Stims.

2776452811.name: Muscle Enhancement
2776452811.description:
> Allows Helldivers to traverse difficult terrain with ease.

Harder to be slowed in bushes, thick mud, deep snow, and water.

4066886572.name: Increased Reinforcement Budget
4066886572.description:
> Increases the number of available reinforcements.

Gives one additional reinforcement per Helldiver.

4136928865.name: UAV Recon Booster
4136928865.description:
> Increases all Helldivers' effective radar range.

Increases all Helldivers' effective radar range by 50% (affects spotting Places of Interest).
Stacks with Nuclear Radar and affects pings from the Scout armor perk.

4273318008.name: Flexible Reinforcement Budget
4273318008.description:
> Reduces time until new reinforcements are granted once they've been depleted.

Reduces reinforcements replenish time by 10%.

3504405746.name: Expert Extraction Pilot
3504405746.description:
> Lowers the time it takes for the extraction shuttle to reach the extraction beacon.

Lowers the extraction time by 15%.

2709264466.name: Motivational Shocks
2709264466.description: > Allows all Helldivers to recover faster after being slowed by an attack, such as acid. Does not mitigate 'area effects,' such as EMS Strikes.Negates slowed-effect inflicted by hostiles.

3912131454.name: Experimental Infusion
3912131454.description:
> Temp Desc: Stims boost movement speed and reduced incoming damage for short period

Gives Stims the added bonus of boosting player movement speed and reducing damage taken for a short time.

3102833400.name: Firebomb Hellpods
3102833400.description: Lines all Hellpods with volatile incendiaries that detonate upon impact, igniting any units in vicinity of the drop site.
